Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1118.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'Thank you for coming.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "I'm sorry, 【kuroname】. To drag you out on your birthday, of all days...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'But... this is a necessary step.', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory667.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.6'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory667.jpg'}
{3: "At Discord's invitation, you arrive at Constellia, a place you hadn't set foot in for a long time."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1118.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.6'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1118.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The sprawling green field is set for a competition, and Discord seems single-mindedly fixated on winning the grand prize.'}
{3: 'When she revealed the catch—that participants must enter in pairs—you agreed to be her partner.'}
{2: "Don't worry about it. Honestly, I could use the break.", 3: '23', 4: "It's okay. I'm interested too.", 5: '23'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: 'Ladies and gentlemen! Welcome to our first-ever Maid and Butler Competition!', 4: '1'}
{3: "A maid and butler competition? So that's what this is about. Don't tell me the prize is some latest-model robot vacuum..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: "Thank you all for your enthusiastic participation! Now, let's not waste another second. The first challenge starts now!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Host', 3: "What's the core of housekeeping? Precision and presentation! Competitors, you must set the dining table perfectly before you, in the shortest time possible!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Before the host's final syllable has even faded, Discord is a whirlwind of motion."}
{2: 'What should I do?', 3: '39', 4: "That can't be...", 5: '39'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Please, just relax, Commandant. Allow me to handle this.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiEnd.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryBlinkNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiChatServeMain/FxUiChatServe01.prefab', 2: '2'}

{3: 'You are gently but firmly guided into your seat. In the space of a single breath, the plain table before you is transformed, now draped in an immaculate white tablecloth and set with neatly arranged tableware, complete with decoratively folded napkins.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiChatServeMain/FxUiChatServe01.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryBlinkNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: "Now that's what I call finesse! Every movement is pure elegance!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "It's nothing worth mentioning.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: "Incredible! It seems the first round was too easy for our talented contestants. No matter! Let's turn up the heat with challenge number two!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'You have one minute to prepare a full afternoon tea service on your table! Begin!', 4: '1'}
{3: "For a moment, you wonder if you misheard the challenge. But not a single other contestant objects. Instead, they all throw themselves into their tasks with an enthusiasm that rivals Discord's."}
{3: 'To your astonishment, several teams have already finished.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: 'Team Sanitizer is pulling out pre-packed takeout from their belly!', 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: 'And Team Lazer is attempting to bake their scones on the spot using high-energy beams! The innovation!', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'Ooh! A close call! They pulled back just as the dough started to smoke... That was almost a charcoal biscuit!', 4: '18'}
{2: '...Are any of these against the rules?', 3: '70', 4: 'That works too...?', 5: '70'}
{3: 'Are none of the participants in this competition actual maids or butlers?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiChatServeMain/FxUiChatServe01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'A perfect, golden-brown madeleine materializes on the plate before you, its warm, buttery aroma irresistible. You find yourself eager to take a bite.'}
{3: 'Beside it, a cup of Earl Grey tea sits, steaming invitingly.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiChatServeMain/FxUiChatServe01.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'Fortunately, I came prepared.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A wave of relief washes over you. At least the refreshments for this afternoon tea are normal, and they seem utterly delicious.'}
{3: "You've always been curious how Discord manages to conjure everyone's afternoon tea as if by magic. When asked about it, this was her answer:"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory717.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "I've undergone rigorous training.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1118.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: 'What a display! Our remaining contestants are truly the best of the best!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Host', 3: "And now, for the final event! Let's talk about a servant's most sacred duty. It's not cleaning or cooking... It's protecting their master!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Host', 3: "The rules are simple! The team whose master is the last one standing wins the grand prize! Defend them with everything you've got!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1146.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen03.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "At the host's signal, chaos immediately erupts. Contestants turn on each other like rivals, the air crackling with imminent conflict."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "I won't let you lay a finger on my master!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHitQiangHuo.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiMovie/FxUiMovieRedline.prefab', 2: '2', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiMovie/FxUiMovieRedline.prefab', 2: '2', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHuijinNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}

{1: '1', 3: 'Your world becomes a storm of shadowy movement and flying projectiles. But nothing gets close. A defensive network of fine red threads slices through the air, deflecting every attack with surgical accuracy.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHuijinNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiMovie/FxUiMovieRedline.prefab', 5: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiMovie/FxUiMovieRedline.prefab', 5: '2'}
{3: 'After an earth-shaking battle, the commotion finally ceases.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1118.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen03.prefab'}
{3: '"Beep—" The host powers down the battle simulation. The contestants, though visibly frazzled, are unharmed; the entire fierce battle was confined to your connected virtual devices.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: "Ma'am, your championship prize. It's... extremely valuable... a bolt of the finest, hand-loomed fabric...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Discord's eyes light up as she claims her prize, a brilliant spark of delight shining within them."}
{1: '1', 3: "Without a moment's delay, she eagerly changes out of her regular clothes and, with needle and thread already in hand, begins to sew."}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'A neckerchief rests against the most sensitive skin on the neck. The fabric must be soft. It must be perfect.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "I've long thought your everyday attire was... lacking.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'This premium fabric is exactly what you needed.', 4: '1'}

{3: "With a final, satisfied snap of the thread, she adjusts the neckerchief with meticulous care. A matching gemstone brooch is pinned into place, and she doesn't step back until she's scrutinized her handiwork from every angle."}
{3: "So that's it. She entered the competition, fought so fiercely... all for this. To make a gift for you..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'As long as it makes you happy.', 4: '1'}

{3: "With Discord, you're always on the receiving end of this relentless, effortless care. You haven't been able to help at all, and the sheer one-sidedness of it all leaves you feeling deeply, and wonderfully, self-conscious."}
{2: 'Is there any of the fabric left?', 3: '181', 4: "I'd like to try making something, too.", 5: '181'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Only a few small scraps...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Mimicking the techniques you'd just witnessed in the competition, you clumsily fold the spare fabric and secure it with a pin, shaping a small, imperfect flower brooch."}
{3: "You then gently take Discord's hand and place the humble token in her palm."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'Is this... for me?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She lifts it up, gazing at the simple fabric flower as if it were a priceless jewel for a long moment. Then, a warm blush begins to bloom across her cheeks.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Thank you... I will cherish it. Always.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Happy birthday, 【kuroname】. I'll carefully tailor this precious moment we share today and tenderly stitch it into the fabric of my memories.", 4: '1'}
